extendedInfo.description: iPinion is a Market Research survey App for smart phones. iPinion is now available for smart phones and tablets running in Android platform. iPinion is a sophisticated survey app ever built for smart phones. It has exciting survey questions including several image interaction types. Users can take surveys on the go and earn rewards.iPinion is non-intrusive, fun to participate and professional.How to participate in surveys?If you are a member of a research panel that has provided you the iPinion download link for taking surveys, they'll send you a user id and password to login and you do not have to register. If you are not a part of a research panel, but would like to participate in surveys, then you can register with us via the app and we will send you the user id and password. Upon opening the app, you will see the survey(s) available for you to participate. You can start a survey by simply clicking on it.To be eligible for the reward points, you need to complete the surveys. Reward points are accumulated until you reach a specific value after which you will have options to redeem your points for cash / gift cards. You can login at www.ipinionrewards.com to check your reward points and redeem them for cash or gift cards. Every 100 points earned equate to 1.00 USD. You should have accumulated a minimum of 500 points ($5.00) to redeem.If you are a part of another research panel, your panel company will provide you the reward point details and redemption options.You can check your reward points from the app. If you have questions on surveys, rewards, redemption, privacy policy or terms of use, please visit www.ipinionrewards.com

reviews.title: No surveys in almost a month
reviews.comment: I have been checking this app at least twice a day for almost a month now and I still haven\'t gotten any survey invitations... Please fix this problem
reviews.author: casey keller

reviews.title: DO NOT INSTALL!!
reviews.comment: Developers are simply getting free surveys from you! They are really four broke dudes iin a room that make money from tricking people into taking two surveys then never giving another one. After that, they record your phone calls, bank pin, address, websites visited, and display them to the public and over facebook. One threatened to kill me when I contacted him. I then explained that I was a huge landscaper that could probably throw him further than a 200 lb bag of fertalizer. He hasnt contacted me since..
reviews.author: Marco Mazariegos

reviews.title: NEVER Any surveys!
reviews.comment: Once you sign up, they give you 2 initial surveys to do. After that you Never see anything else, except spam mail. DO NOT INSTALL!!!
reviews.author: Jeff Fullerton

reviews.title: Can\'t login
reviews.comment: I\'ll give it a credit for apparently installing without problem but it won\'t let me in using the username and password I was given.  Waste of time
reviews.author: Alan Toms

reviews.title: Can\'t log in
reviews.comment: Set up an account and the supplied password doesn\'t work. Request a \"forgotten password\" email and it arrives in French with a mangled password attached.  Pointless.
reviews.author: Iain Purdie

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: I don\'t ever get surveys, uninstalling right now.
reviews.author: Dustin Woolworth

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: I had this for over a year... I used to get surveys all the time. Actually got paid a few times... I haven\'t received a new survey in close to 6 months..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: rubbish
reviews.comment: can\'t log in due to incorrect password. sent me a new 20 digit password in a email written in french  still cant log in.
reviews.author: Wendy Ball

reviews.title: Do not install.
reviews.comment: You do not receive any new surveys. Installed update, stopped working and wouldn\'t let me log in. It would be a good app if it worked.
reviews.author: Nicole Reboja

reviews.title: Worst
reviews.comment: I waited a month for surveys and didn\'t get any so I am uninstalling.
reviews.author: Sarah Percifield

reviews.title: Junk.
reviews.comment: Got to so (1) survey the 1st day when I installed. Zilch ever since. Crap, crap, crap. Don\'t download.
reviews.author: Sam Atkins

reviews.title: Spyware?
reviews.comment: First, I can\'t sign in even using the password sent to me via email. Secondly, I have a spyware app that says this app records my phone calls. Wtf. Uninstall.
reviews.author: Michelle G

reviews.title: This would be cool if
reviews.comment: You even get any surveys.! What\'s the point? Had this app for a week now and not a single survey is posted or displayed. Fix this now!
reviews.author: Frances Wong

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: You never get any new surveys and you can even look at the rewards to see of its worth it.
reviews.author: Brittany Rotzien

reviews.title: Utter rubbish
reviews.comment: Keeps popping up annoying messages about pending responses after filling in a survey (2 days and counting so far, despite phone being connected to Wi-Fi). The pending responses mage ha popped up twice whilst writing this!  Crashes when pictures added to it and survey has to be done all over again.  Waste of time!
reviews.author: Dave Edge

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: You get no surveys EVER!!! It was a waste of my time, and nobody else should download this.
reviews.author: Zac Tarmey

reviews.title: Bull to get you to fill out a survey
reviews.comment: About automobiles, access your personals & about the kind of phone you have. Pays nothing. Just another no income garb to pollute your phone & the net.
reviews.author: Roger King

reviews.title: Constant Location Manager Usage :(
reviews.comment: It\'s responsive and functional when you are actually given a survey, otherwise it\'s a horrible application that seems to engage Location Manager wakelock and does not let your phone ever enter a deep sleep, sucking your battery dead. Definitely needs to be coded better!
reviews.author: Adrian Cheng

reviews.title: No surveys
reviews.comment: Had since sept 12 and had 2 surveys - very poor! Plus,  why are all positive comments from \"a google user\" obviously fakes
reviews.author: Rhiannon Ward

reviews.title: No survey
reviews.comment: you don\'t get any survey ever, which means no reward at all, so I\'m thinking it\'s all about just spying on your phone\'s activities. Also, the few enthusiastic reviews sound pretty fake to me. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Francesca Conti
